lines: Lubono nsi lu yandi, na ba mali onse;
Ndi la yanda kujulu, ku njila mu luba;
MwiBbuku lya kujulu, li salalisya ngwa,
Ko ndi ambila Jesu, wa ka ndi lemba mo?
Wa ka ndi lemba mo, mwiBbuku lituba,
Ilya bulelo bwako? Sena ndi lembedwe?
Nzinji zibi zyangu zili mbuli musenga,
Zibi nazi vula, zila ku tubizigwa.
Munzi oyo mubotu, manda a salala,
Ta ku siki kubi ko, ku bisya kubotu,
Bangele ba la linda, sena ndi lembedwe.
